section.name: System
section.description: These are default system settings. Please do not change.

setting.name: System Name
setting.description: The package/system name (all lower case in the case of package names)

setting.name: Version
setting.description: The current version of this system. This is automatically version stamped from the build script.

setting.name: Debugging
setting.description: If set to true, all events will be recorded to the log file for the purpose of debugging errors.

setting.name: User Name
setting.description: The name of the person using this system.

setting.name: About Text
setting.description: The description text that will show up in the wiki about file.
setting.value: XeTeX-TIPE is a Scripture publishing management system written by the friendly developers at Payap University's Linguistics Institute (Text Unit). TIPE stands for TeX Intitated Publishing Envionment. It is currently being deployed in MSEAG and is under heavy development. Anyone wanting to try this system should be warned that it may not work in their context. However, the underlying principals of the system should work in any long document publishing environment. Therefore the package should be evaluated with that in mind. We welcome input and participation in this project. It is our hope it will be able to serve more than just MSEAG. For questions or more information please write: dennis_drescher@sil.org.

setting.name: Interface Language ID Code
setting.description: The language ID code that sets the language to be used in the user interface.

setting.name: Log File Length
setting.description: This is the maximum number of lines that will be permited to be in the log file. This is necessary because TIPE records all events in one log file.

setting.name: Makefile Start Parameters
setting.description: Add extra parameters to the makefile call. This is useful for debugging. Be sure to leave the default command in place or nothing will work.

setting.name: TIPE Settings Last Edit Date
setting.description: Time stamp of when the TIPE settings were last edited.

setting.name: User Settings Last Edit Date
setting.description: Time stamp of when the user settings were last edited.

setting.name: System Initialization Date
setting.description: Time stamp of when the system was installed.

setting.name: Lock Extention Name
setting.description: File lock extention. Files that are locked in the system must have a lock extention.
